description: Square array T(n, k) read by antidiagonals upwards, n >= 0 and k >= 0: for any m >= 0, let f_m be the representation of m in the factorial number system: for any i >= 0, 0 <= f_m(i) <= i and m = Sum_{i >= 0} f_m(i) * i!; the representation of T(n, k) in the factorial number system, say g, satisfies g(i) = f_n(f_k(i)) for any i >= 0.
